about_me.des1: I am a Red Hat Senior Consultant focus on App Dev domain. I'm passionate about enabling Enterprise clients to accelerate digital transformation using open source technology and open practises.
about_me.des2: I am a skilled communicator with a passion of turning technologies and tools into values. With 14+ years of java software engineer experience, I was trained to be a good hand for developing new ideas, solving problems, and contributing to team work.
about_me.des3: People like to ask me: 'What has attracted you to stay in RedHat for 11+ years?'
about_me.des4: The answer is simple: It's the Open Culture. At Redhat, everyone is expected to be a leader.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.
